sentences.en: " When Juicy Tidbit came , she was very nice.
sentences.cn: “ 小嫩肉到这儿以后,人缘很好.

sentences.en: A knife slipped through the outer part and inside the meat was tender and juicy.
sentences.cn: 用刀把表面划开,就是嫩肉,鲜美的肉原汁.

sentences.en: I want all the juicy details.
sentences.cn: 我需要所有有趣的细节.

sentences.en: It provided some juicy gossip for a few days.
sentences.cn: 这制造了一些非常八卦的流言蜚语，足够说上几天的。

sentences.en: It was firm and juicy, like meat, but it was not red.
sentences.cn: 又坚实又多汁, 像牲口的肉, 不过不是红色的.

sentences.en: John would ask, biting into a juicy hamburger.
sentences.cn: 约翰一边咬着多汁的汉堡包,一边问.

sentences.en: Juicy Tidbit had taken his clothes and run away.
sentences.cn: 小嫩肉把客人的衣裳剥下来,自己穿上,逃了.

sentences.en: Look, how fresh and juicy those grapes are.
sentences.cn: 瞧, 这些葡萄怪水灵的.

sentences.en: Post offices of that day were not juicy political plums.
sentences.cn: 当时的邮局并不是有油水的肥缺.

sentences.en: The flesh of the peach was sweet and juicy.
The meat was tender and juicy.
These tomatoes are plump and juicy.
They are chewing the juicy grass which makes their fur sleek.
sentences.cn: 它们吃了含有乳汁的酥油草,膘肥体壮,毛色格外发亮,好象每一根毛尖都冒着油星.

sentences.en: This sugar cane is quite a sweet and juicy.

words.tran_cn: [食品]多汁的；利润多的；生动的

trans.tran_cn: 多汁的，有趣的，刺激性强的，报酬多的
